baseRule.text: 若復苾芻畜長鉢過十日不分別者。泥薩祇波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: Dasāhaparamaṁ atirekapatto dhāretabbo, taṁ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 21

translations.text: Eine Extraschale darf man für höchstens zehn Tage behalten. Überschreitet man diese (Frist), muß man (die Extraschale) aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
A monk should keep an extra almsbowl for ten days at the most. If he keeps it longer than that, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
Un cuenco extra puede ser guardado 10 días como máximo. Pasado ese tiempo: ha de ser renunciado y confesado.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。畜長鉢得至十日若過畜。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: 若比丘長鉢乃至十日應畜。若過。尼薩耆波夜提。

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。長鉢乃至十日若過。尼薩耆波逸提。

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。長鉢得十日畜。若過者。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！畜長鉢不淨施，得齊十日。若過者，尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 21

translations.text: If a monk store up an old rice bowl (or, it may be, “an extra rice bowl”), or if he obtain and preserve one that has not been consecrated and given to him officially, he may keep it for ten days, but if beyond that, it is Nissaggiya Pācittiya.
Seorang bhikṣu dapat menyimpan mangkuk dana tambahan selama sepuluh hari tanpa pemberian murni. Jika ia menyimpannya lebih lama, ia melakukan sebuah naiḥsargika pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 鉢。不淨施得齊十日。若過者尼若比丘畜長薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: 若比丘畜長鉢不淨施。過十日。尼薩耆波逸提。

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。長鉢得十日畜。若過者尼薩耆波夜提。
